    • Constructor Detail

      • Boat

        public Boat​(float robustness,
            float speed,
            float acceleration,
            float maneuverability,
            int boatType,
            Lane lane)
        Construct a boat object.
        Parameters:
        robustness - The maximum boat 'health'
        speed - The boat's maximum speed
        acceleration - The boat's acceleration
        maneuverability - The boat's turning speed
        boatType - The array position for boat stats
        lane - The lane the boat is racing in
        Since:
        1

    • Method Detail

      • createBoatBody

        public void createBoatBody​(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                           float posX,
                           float posY,
                           java.lang.String bodyFile)
        Creates a boat body.
        Parameters:
        world - World to create the body in
        posX - x location of the body, in meters
        posY - y location of the body, in meters
        bodyFile - the name of the box2D editor json file for the body fixture
        Since:
        1

      • getLimitsAt

        public float[] getLimitsAt​(float yPosition)
        Gets the left and right limits of a boat at a given y-position.
        Parameters:
        yPosition - The y-position to check left and right limits at.
        Returns:
        A list of length 2, 0 index left boundary, 1 index right boundary
        Since:
        1

      • hasFinished

        public boolean hasFinished()
        Checks if the boat has finished the race.
        Returns:
        True if the boat passed the finish line, false otherwise
        Since:
        1
